comments:
1. do any changes (add/delete plugins/configs)
2. checkin the library.xmi and config.xmi
3. in resource perspective, right click on library.xmi, do Team-->Refresh Status
4. it will create exceptions in log (see below)
5. switch back to authoring, library view is gone

This seems related to refresh/reload issues (bugs 152249, 152489 and 152492)

UI refreshing was not synchronized so many refresh jobs stepped on each other.

for build 0801_1835 and in CC

1. This refresh issue still exists and the java.lang.NullPointerException in .log when do a Team-->Refresh Status on library.xmi after checkin library.xmi

2. when update a view, the library view disappears

If I re-open the library, all looks fine.

So still some refresh issues left.
Reference to ResourceManager in URIConverter did not get updated right after library.xmi got reloaded
